title: Califia Farms - Oatmilks, Almondmilks, Creamers, Coffees
snippet: Discover delicious and nourishing Oatmilks, Almondmilks, Creamers, Coffees, and other natural, non-GMO beverages from Califia Farms. We’re dedicated to powering your wellness transformation by innovating better forms of nourishment with delicious dairy-free plant-based products.

title: Find Your Perfect Match - Califia Farms
snippet: Deliciously indulgent plant-based creamers that turn your cup of coffee into an anytime treat.

title: Irresistibly Good Plant-Based Milks - Califia Farms
snippet: Our dairy-free milks are delicious to drink and perfect in cereal, smoothies, and recipes. From almond, oat, coconut and beyond. We offer the perfect plant-based solution for every occasion.

title: Organic Unsweetened Almondmilk - Califia Farms
snippet: Awesome Almond Milk I switched to the Organic Almond Milk recently for dietary reasons. Love this so much! Question: Once I open the bottle, how many days is it good before I need to discard any remaining milk? Thanks Califia Farms!
